name: Naga Siren
title: Slithice
lore: Slithice is a warrior of the deep, fighting to restore her people's honor. Her voice and illusions are deadly.

mirrorImage.name: Mirror Image
mirrorImage.description: Creates illusions of Naga Siren that deal damage and take increased damage.

ensnare.name: Ensnare
ensnare.description: Interrupts and roots a target enemy, preventing movement and invisibility.

riptide.name: Rip Tide
riptide.description: Naga and her illusions create a wave that damages enemies and reduces their armor.

songOfTheSiren.name: Song of the Siren
songOfTheSiren.description: Puts all enemies in range to sleep, making them invulnerable but unable to act.
